name: Nigella Lawson
bio: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed sit amet lacus condimentum, bibendum libero a, feugiat nunc. Praesent in dolor in purus consequat malesuada. Nullam eget dignissim lorem.

cookingMethod: 1. Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
2. While the spaghetti is cooking, fry the pancetta in a large skillet over medium-high heat until crisp.
3. In a bowl, beat together the eggs and Parmesan cheese.
4. Drain the spaghetti, reserving 1/2 cup of the cooking water.
5. Add the spaghetti to the skillet with the pancetta and toss to coat.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat and add the egg mixture, tossing quickly to avoid scrambling the eggs.
7. Add some of the reserved cooking water to make a creamy sauce.
8. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.
